src:
Kunci MU Kalahkan Partizan Belgrade: Incar Gol Cepat
07 Nov 2019, 18:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah rasa optimisme diapungkan Ashley Young jelang pertandingan melawan Partizan Belgrade dini hari nanti. Young mengatakan bahwa Manchester United bisa memenangkan laga itu jika mereka mampu mengincar gol cepat.
Manchester United akan kembali beraksi di ajang Liga Europa dini hari nanti. Mereka akan menjamu wakil Serbia, Partizan Belgrade di Old Trafford.
Ini adalah pertandingan kandang pertama United setelah mereka melakoni empat laga tandang beruntung. Alhasil ada harapan dari para fans Setan Merah agar United bisa meraih kemenangan besar di laga ini.
Young mengakui bahwa sepanjang musim ini timnya kesulitan untuk mencetak banyak gol. "Mayoritas pertandingan kami berakhir dengan margin gol yang tipis," beber Young kepada situs resmi Manchester United.

Baca komentar lengkap sang bek di bawah ini.
text:
Key MU Defeats Partizan Belgrade: Aims for Fast Goals
Nov 7 2019, 18:40 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A sense of optimism floated Ashley Young ahead of the match against Partizan Belgrade in the early morning. Young said that Manchester United could win the fight if they were able to aim for a quick goal.
Manchester United will return to action in the Europa League this morning. They will host the Serbian representative, Partizan Belgrade at Old Trafford.
This is United's first home game after they played four lucky away games. As a result there is hope from the Red Devils fans that United can win a big victory in this fight.
Young admitted that throughout the season his team struggled to score a lot of goals. "The majority of our matches ended with a thin goal margin," Young told the official Manchester United website.

Read the full defender's comments below.
